title: Class IX student found dead at Dhaka house
body: A Class IX student was found dead in her house at Shanir Akhra in Dhaka on Saturday. The deceased was Samia Akter Dia, 15, a student of Dania Barnamala High School and daughter of Anwar Hossain of Palashpur area. Nazmul, brother of Samia, said that after evening, she went to the bathroom and locked the door. When she did not respond for a long time, family members broke the door and found her hanging with a scarf wrapped around her neck. She was quickly rescued and taken to Dhaka Medical College Hospital where doctors declared her dead on arrival. Inspector Md Faruk, in charge of the DMCH police outpost, said that the body had been kept at the hospital morgue and the Kadamtali police station had been informed of the incident.
